item.title: What should I do if my pug has diarrhea? Why do you have diarrhea?
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: The silly and charming appearance of the pug has attracted many people’s attention, making it a popular pet dog nowadays. But in the process of caring for the pug, we can’t be sloppy. In the summer, it’s not uncommon for pugs to have diarrhea, and it’s necessary to know the relevant knowledge in advance. In the following, the editor of Porky.com will analyze the causes of diarrhea in pug dogs and the measures to deal with it.
